resources.string: I am an enthusiastic Android Developer with 2 years experience eager to continue to contribute to team success through hard work, attention to detail and excellent organizational skills. Clear understanding of the Android operating system and training in relevant languages like Java and Kotlin among others. Motivated to learn, grow and excel in the Mobile Technology Industry.
Hey Faith, I saw your resume and I\'m impressed. I would like to offer you…
Whatsapp is not available on this device
No email app is on this device

I am willing and eager to offer your company my skills and expertise in Android Development. I am capable of leading a team of developers and organization in order to bring out results in the shortest amonunt of time

string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: I single handed built the app that utilizes the Udemy REST API to make it easy to search and explore courses right from the app.  Used third-party libraries such as Retrofit and Glide for networking and image loading  Incorporated offline storage (Room), recommended UI/UX (Material Design) and MVVM architecture for seamless use  This app was voted 4th best out of over 150 reviewed projects throughout Africa during the course
Artti is an app I built during NASA Space Apps 2022 Hackathon. It utilizes Artificial Intelligence to create artistic pictures of imaginary space arts

string-array.name: whatIDid
string-array.item: A 1 year internship where I learnt Kotlin, went through course in the Advanced Android development while being guided by professional Android Developers who are mentors. At the end of the internship, I built a full-fledged app from start to finish and uploaded to play store.
A 3 months internship of intense learning. Still in progress…
